article:
This 'list of railway accidents in the United Kingdom' provides details of
significant railway crashes in the United Kingdom involving railway rolling
stock, but not other railway related incidents such as the Oxford Circus fire of
1984 or the King's Cross fire of 1987 or suicide.

Tables are sortable, click on heading to sort by the selected column.
categories: Railway accidents in the United Kingdom|
Lists of rail transport accidents|United Kingdom
headings: Other major losses of life on railway premises
